itl.enabler.api

Class PumpAuthoriseLimits

  • java.lang.Object
    • itl.enabler.api.PumpAuthoriseLimits

  • public class PumpAuthoriseLimits
extends java.lang.Object
    This object contains parameters to determine delivery limits and timeouts for a pump authorisation. These values override the system defaults for calls to authoriseWithLimits

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PumpAuthoriseLimits()
      Constructor for PumpAuthoriseLimits with default values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Read the time the pump will remain authorised.
      int getFuellingTimeout()
      Number of seconds fuel flow may stop during delivery before a Hose Event is fired.

      The Price Level to be used for this authorisation.
      ProductCollection getProducts()
      A list of allowed Grade Id's permitted for the authorisation.
      double getQuantity()
      Quantity Limit (Volume or Weight) to be allowed for this authorisation.

      Money limit to be allowed for this authorisation.

      • getFuellingTimeout

        public int getFuellingTimeout()
        Number of seconds fuel flow may stop during delivery before a Hose Event is fired.
        Returns:
        the time fuelling is allowed to remain idle.

        The Price Level to be used for this authorisation.

        public double getValue()
        Money limit to be allowed for this authorisation.
        Returns:
        the permitted money value.

      • setAuthoriseTimeout

        public void setAuthoriseTimeout(int authoriseTimeout)
        Determines the time (seconds) that the pump authorisation is valid. If this time expires before the nozzle is lifted, the Transaction state will change to Completed, and the CompletionReason set to Timeout.
        Parameters:
        authoriseTimeout - Number of seconds. If zero the system global timeout will be used.

      • setFuellingTimeout

        public void setFuellingTimeout(int fuellingTimeout)
        Number of seconds fuel flow may stop during delivery before the Pump.onHoseEvent fires to indicate a Nozzle Left out Event.
        Parameters:
        fuellingTimeout - Number of seconds. If zero the system global timeout will be used.

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(int level)
        Set the price level for this authorisation.
        Parameters:
        level - Price Level

      • setProducts

        public void setProducts(ProductCollection products)
        Set the allowed products for the authorisation.
        Parameters:
        products - List of permitted hose products.

      • setQuantity

        public void setQuantity(double quantity)
        Set the limit permitted for this authorisation.
        Parameters:
        quantity - Quantity limit (Volume or Weight) permitted.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(double value)
        Set the money limit permitted for this authorisation.
        Parameters:
        value - Money limit permitted.
